summary: Added buffer-local autoread check to FileChangedShell autocmd. Buffers with autoread=false now skip automatic reload, enabling task 84's Himalaya compose buffer protection to work correctly.

artifacts.summary: Modified FileChangedShell callback to check vim.bo[args.buf].autoread before reloading

completion_data.completion_summary: Fixed FileChangedShell autocmd to respect buffer-local autoread settings. Added elseif branch that checks vim.bo[args.buf].autoread == false and sets fcs_choice to empty string to skip reload. This enables Himalaya compose buffers (which set autoread=false) to retain their content when external changes occur.

next_steps: Test Himalaya compose workflow to verify drafts are no longer corrupted by file reload
